entries.title: Merge pull request #3 from AkikozZM/DeployTest
entries.whats_new: Fixed bugs related to the language model and updated the changelog.
entries.impact: Users experience more reliable functionality and see updated changelog entries.

entries.title: Update main.py
entries.whats_new: Made updates to the main Python script to improve performance or functionality.
entries.impact: Enhances the backend operation without disrupting user experience.

entries.title: Fix bug of cannot save to github repo
entries.whats_new: Resolved an issue preventing saving data to GitHub repositories.
entries.impact: Users can now successfully save data to their GitHub repositories, improving usability.

entries.title: Save the cache to local perm
entries.whats_new: Implemented local permanent storage for cache data.
entries.impact: Caching now persists locally, resulting in faster load times and better offline access.

entries.title: Add some limit on entries
entries.whats_new: Introduced limitations on the number of entries stored.
entries.impact: Prevents excessive data accumulation, ensuring smoother performance.

entries.title: Merge branch 'main' of https://github.com/AkikozZM/Changelog-App
entries.whats_new: Merged latest changes from the main branch.
entries.impact: Keeps the project up-to-date with the latest improvements.

entries.title: Keep the local generate cache strategy
entries.whats_new: Maintained strategy for generating cache locally.
entries.impact: Ensures consistent caching behavior for improved speed and reliability.

entries.title: Update requirements.txt
entries.whats_new: Updated dependencies for the project.
entries.impact: Ensures compatibility with latest libraries and tools.

entries.title: Interact with Railway and Github webhook
entries.whats_new: Enabled interaction with Railway deployment platform and Github webhooks.
entries.impact: Automates deployment and integration processes, streamlining updates.

entries.title: Deploy on Railway Ready
entries.whats_new: Deployment prepared for Railway platform.
entries.impact: Application is now ready for deployment on Railway, improving accessibility.

entries.title: Back-end api deploy on Railway Success
entries.whats_new: Back-end API deployment was successful on Railway.
entries.impact: Backend services are now live, supporting the application's operations.

entries.title: Update requirements.txt
entries.whats_new: Further updates to project dependencies.
entries.impact: Maintains environment consistency and compatibility.

entries.title: Python 3.11
entries.whats_new: Switched or tested compatibility with Python version 3.11.
entries.impact: Enables use of new Python features, possibly improving efficiency.

entries.title: Create railway.json
entries.whats_new: Added configuration file for Railway deployment.
entries.impact: Facilitates deployment automation and configuration.

entries.title: Open Back-end API to other users
entries.whats_new: Now users can configure their own Git Repos, OpenAI LLM, API Key, etc.
entries.impact: This introduces a significant change allowing personalized configurations, which could affect security and stability. Users can now set their own API settings, making the system more flexible but also requiring careful management of credentials.

entries.title: Collect interface to src\types.ts
entries.whats_new: Consolidated interface definitions into a single file for easier management.
entries.impact: Simplifies maintenance and development of interface schemas.

entries.title: Polish Front-end Page
entries.whats_new: Decorated home page, added loading effects, cleaned unnecessary code.
entries.impact: Improves user experience and interface aesthetics.

entries.title: Add more details on the Detail.tsx
entries.whats_new: Enhanced the detail page with a floating navbar.
entries.impact: Provides better navigation and detail viewing for users.

entries.title: Changelog detail page implementation
entries.whats_new: Implemented detailed log page, clicking entries shows specific details.
entries.impact: Changing navigation flow to allow users to view detailed entries impacts how users interact with logs, possibly requiring them to adapt to new behavior.

entries.title: Use json cache strategy to connect front-end and back-end
entries.whats_new: Back-end generates a JSON cache; front-end loads this cache for changelog display.
entries.impact: This shifts the data loading process to a caching approach, which may affect data freshness and loading procedures, requiring users to understand cache behavior.

entries.title: Polish the Sidebar component. Basic layout of ChangelogOverview page
entries.whats_new: Improved sidebar layout and overview page.
entries.impact: Enhances navigation and overview presentation.

entries.title: Optimize constants to constants/index.tsx file
entries.whats_new: Centralized constants management.
entries.impact: Eases future updates and improves code organization.

entries.title: Front-end layout implementation
entries.whats_new: Built a navigation sidebar, with collapsible items and hover effects.
entries.impact: Provides users with a navigable interface to browse different sections.

entries.title: Basic front-end web implementation
entries.whats_new: Created a web interface to display changelog automatically generated by OpenAI.
entries.impact: Introduces a new frontend for users to view changelogs, changing how they interact with project data, with auto-generated content including dates, news, impacts, and possible breaking changes.

entries.title: Update the llm and schemas
entries.whats_new: Enhanced the generator to support auto-detection of breaking changes.
entries.impact: Automates identification of breaking changes in commits, which can improve awareness but also introduces new logic that may need user understanding.
